title: Was a Nurse Who Spoke at the GOP Convention Charged With Shooting a Woman?
subtitle: Amy Thorn, also known as Amy Johnson Ford, rose to prominence in August 2020, when she praised President Donald Trump.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Amy Thorn, a West Virginia nurse who spoke at the Republican National Convention in August 2020, was charged with shooting a woman in the stomach in October 2020.
